senses.gloss: Generous or forgiving, especially toward a rival or less powerful person.
senses.example: In a magnanimous gesture, she forgave her opponent.

senses.gloss: Relating to or situated at the edge or margin; of secondary importance.
senses.example: The difference in cost is marginal.

senses.gloss: A system of parts working together in a machine; a piece of machinery.
senses.example: The mechanism controlling the door needs repair.

senses.gloss: A system of methods used in a particular area of study or activity.
senses.example: The research methodology was clearly described in the paper.

senses.gloss: Showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise.
senses.example: The scientist kept meticulous records of every experiment.

senses.gloss: The impetus and driving force gained by the development of a process or course of events.
senses.example: The campaign gained momentum as more people joined.
